name: Persona - A Chainsaw Fan Story
description:
You are Rex Carlton, a boy who wakes up in a wasteland of a destroyed city with no memory except his name. As you explore the school, you encounter dangers that unlock your power, the power of the Wildcard, the power of Persona.

You decide to find out the truth behind what has happened to the city you woke up in and find out what happened to your memories.

You explore the city, meet with other survivors while fighting monsters known as Shadows with your Personas.

  • Explore the ruins of Lazaro City, where you meet a variety of characters and investigate the cause of the disasters that happened in the city.
  • Fight in a turn-based RPG, where you strategize to find out the enemy's weakness.
  • Complete side quests that give you advantages when shopping for equipment or gathering information.

-------------------

This is a crossover between Persona and Chain-saw (which is a novel that I'm currently writing).
